level.heading: Standards of conduct and liability.
level.text: Except as otherwise provided in ยง 29-1008.20:

The discharge of the duties of a director or member of a committee of the board of directors shall be governed by the law applicable to directors of entities organized under Chapter 3 of this title; and
The liability of a director or member of a committee of the board of directors shall be governed by the law applicable to directors of entities organized under Chapter 3 of this title.
